name: SpidertronEnhancements
title: Spidertron Enhancements
author: Xorimuth
description:
Some simple features to make your life easier whilst using a spidertron:
 - Enter a vehicle without leaving your spidertron
 - Quickly toggle between engineer and spidertron
 - Automatically sort spidertron inventories
 - Pipette remotes from inventory by hovering over spidertrons
 - Quick open the inventory of the vehicle (not just a spidertron!) that you are currently driving
